texasholdem

Class HoldemManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • texasholdem.HoldemManager

  • public class HoldemManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class controls the entire poker game. It is the only part of the underlying game that interacts with the user interface.
    Author:
    John Wardell

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FIVE_MINUTES
      5 minutes in milliseconds

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying(int index)
        Checks if the indicated player is in "playing" state.
        Parameters:
        index - of the player in the player array.
        Returns:
        true if player is still playing, false if not.

      • getPlayerPersonality

        public int getPlayerPersonality()
        Gets personality value of player whose turn it is.
        Returns:
        current player's personality, 0 for user player.

      • getLowChips

        public int getLowChips()
        Gets the amount of chips that the poorest player who is currently playing.
        Returns:
        the poorest player's chip amount.

      • getMaxBet

        public int getMaxBet()
        Gets the largest amount the player whose turn it is can legally bet.
        Returns:
        current player's maximum bet.

      • getAmtToSee

        public int getAmtToSee()
        Gets the amount needed to bet to stay in the game.
        Returns:
        amount needed to stay in the game.

      • getMinBet

        public int getMinBet()
        Gets the minimum bet or 'big blind' bet for the round.
        Returns:
        the minimum bet amount.

      • getPlayerBet

        public int getPlayerBet()
        Gets the amount the player whose turn it is has bet so far this hand.
        Returns:
        the current player's total bet.

      • getNumPlayers

        public int getNumPlayers()
        This method returns the number of players including players that have folded or run out of money.
        Returns:
        the total number of players.

      • getPlayingPlayers

        public int getPlayingPlayers()
        Calculates and returns the number of currently playing players.
        Returns:
        the number of playing players.

        public Phase getPhase()
        Returns:
        the phase of the current game.

        public Card[] getCommCards()
        Gets the correct community cards for each round of play.
        Returns:
        array of community cards.

      • startNewGame

        public void startNewGame()
        Restarts the entire program to play a new game.

      • startHand

        public void startHand()
        Starts a new hand of cards, deals the cards to players, and makes the big blind and small blind bets. Resets allIn, allInAmt, takeTurnsCount, minimum bet, and blind indexes.

      • takeTurns

        public void takeTurns()
        Starts the process of players taking turns.

      • startTurn

        public void startTurn()
        Takes a player's turn. Stops the turn timer for the duration of the turn for human and computer players.

      • finishLastTurn

        public void finishLastTurn()
        Wraps up a players turn. Updates relevant UI components. Increments turnIndex and takeTurnsCount.

      • acceptUserBet

        public void acceptUserBet(int userBet)
        Called from user interface when user places a bet.
        Parameters:
        userBet - the amount the user player would like to bet.

      • startNextPhase

        public void startNextPhase()
        Called from the user interface to see the next cards. Increments the phase, resets turnIndex, resets takeTurnsCount, and checks for an all-in state.

      • getPot

        public int getPot()
        Gets the current pot total.
        Returns:
        the pot.

      • getHighBet

        public int getHighBet()
        Gets the highest bet of all the playing players.
        Returns:
        the current high bet.

      • haveAllPlayersBet

        public boolean haveAllPlayersBet()
        Checks if all players have taken their turn once.
        Returns:
        true if all players have taken a turn, false if not.

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
